response: Oh my love, you're looking so pleasant today! The sun is shining great on your face, and I can't help but feel wonderful when I'm near you. I hate it when we have to deal with unpleasant things, but I know that life isn't always awful. Terrible things happen, but we can get through them together, hand in hand. And speaking of hands, have you seen the clerical workers in the office? They're always so busy typing away, but they never seem to get anything done. Programmers are a different story altogether - they're always tapping away on their computers, creating wonderful things. Secretaries, too, are so important - they keep everything running smoothly and make sure we have all the data we need. But enough about work, let's focus on us. I love you so much, my dear!
